properties.name: eventsTarget
properties.description:
Events handlers target. By default the element listens on
`window` object. If set, all events listeners will be attached to this
object instead of `window`.

properties.name: _oldEventsTarget
properties.description: An event target used to attach listeners.

methods.name: _eventsTargetChanged
methods.description:
Removes old handlers (if any) and attaches listeners on new event
event target.

params.name: eventsTarget
params.description:
Event target to set handlers on. If not set it
will set handlers on the `window` object.

methods.name: _attachListeners
methods.description: To be implement by the element to set event listeners on the target

methods.name: _detachListeners
methods.description: To be implement by the element to remove event listeners from the target

mixins.name: EventsTargetMixin

attributes.name: events-target
attributes.description:
Events handlers target. By default the element listens on
`window` object. If set, all events listeners will be attached to this
object instead of `window`.
